section.name: Resource Dependencies
section.p: A resource may declare runtime dependencies that it has on other resources. Dependencies may be declaring using one or more <include> elements.

subsection.name: Include Variants
subsection.p: There are three different include declarations - key, ref and uri.

tr.td: Includes a resource from the same module.
Includes a resource using a fully qualified path.
Includes a resource via artifact reference.

section.name: Example
section.p: The following resource definition declares two dependencies. The first dependency is on the resource named "ant" within the same module. The second dependency is on the junit resource and uses the fully qualified path under a ref attribute.
